profile.title: Hi, I'm Rahul Suthar
profile.headline: Front-End Developer
profile.summary: I'm a passionate Front-End Web Developer. I build beautiful, responsive websites with clean, efficient code. From interactive user interfaces to pixel-perfect designs, I turn ideas into powerful web solutions.

projects.title: Cinema Review App
projects.description: A React app that lets users search and explore detailed movie info, including ratings, cast, and directors, using data from the OMDb API. It features a clean, responsive design for all devices.

projects.title: Git Issue Tracker
projects.description: A web app using Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, and Redux Toolkit to track, manage, and comment on issues, with a responsive, user-friendly interface

projects.title: Find Pokémon App
projects.description: Dynamic React app that lets users search for Pokémon by name or ID, displaying details like types, abilities, moves, and stats using data from the PokeAPI.

experience.description: A React.js web application that lets users search for Pokémon by name or ID and retrieve detailed information about them. The app uses the PokeAPI to fetch data and displays information like types, abilities, moves, height, weight, and experience.
